author: davidwalter2
body:
#### PR description:

There are updates concerning the different configurations for the different years of the UL, these is implemented using era modifier. There are also cosmetic updates and functional updates on the module itself.

#### PR validation:

It was tested locally with the test file in /DQMOffline/Lumi/test/ZCounting_cfg.py for different years on thesingle muon primary dataset (where it is intended to run only).
title: Updates on DQMOffline ZCounting for ultra legacy reco
